name: Vulpecula
description:
Water bursts forth from the rivers in a ferocious charge, consuming all in its path. Traverse winding and treacherous terrain quickly to reach refuge with the moon on higher ground, before the water reaches you first and pulls you under.

Controls:
ArrowKeys - move
Z - jump
X - ability
Enter - pause

Art: https://spixelspixels.neocities.org/
Code: RainbowCemetery
